source: A source or an information source is the origin of an information.
layout: An arrangement, a graphic structure in which you can tidy up your graphic elements in a well organized way.
renderer: A renderer serves to make the depiction of data. It is the part which allows to visualize(display) elements.
zone: is the location, the place where we wish to post(show) the data in our screen...
behaviour: Is the behavior of different arranged elements...
explication: Creating a configuration from another (compatible) Domain Element's configuration is going to allow you creating a configuration in the same context and linking them once they (both 2) are validated
